detail_desc: Top in jersey made from a cotton blend with decorative stitching, a round neck and short sleeves with a small frill trim.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist. Fake fly, front pockets, flap leg pockets, fake back pockets with a flap and straight legs in a relaxed fit.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, lightly padded cups that provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide, sleeveless top in a modal blend with a dry hand feel. V-neck, hole-embroidery at the top and narrow shoulder straps.

Parka in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, mesh-lined hood with an elasticated edge and press-studs. Small stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Bracelets in metal curb chain with a trigger clasp. One bracelet is decorated with rhinestones.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Soft, non-wired bra in mesh and satin with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long, cuffed sleeves and a rounded hem.

Soft jersey pyjamas with a unique nursing feature. Top with long raglan sleeves, designed with a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Sweatpant bottoms with a wide waistband offering comfortable support, and cuffed hems. The waistband can be folded over post-pregnancy.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, seam at the hips, flounced skirt and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Biker jacket in imitation suede with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Non-wired bikini top with a tie detail at the front and moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable fastening at the back.

Nursing jumper in an airy, fine knit with a unique nursing feature, round neck and long sleeves. Inner top in jersey with a woven lower section. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and a pair of knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Fitted cycling shorts in glossy jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Warm-lined boots in quilted nylon with imitation leather sections and a hook and loop fastening at one side. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Thin metal chain anklet decorated with small, round, metal pendants. Adjustable length 23-27 cm.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the jacket is organic.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave with a V neck, small stand-up collar and smocking around the neckline. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 23 cm.
Smocked bikini top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. No fasteners.

Knee-length, V-neck nursing dress in soft jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and narrow, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative tie. Practical inner top for easier nursing access. Unlined.
Metal hoop earrings in four different sizes ranging from 1 to 1.5 cm.
Short, sleeveless jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a print on the front and lined drawstring hood. Zip down the front, side pockets and wide ribbing at the hem. Brushed inside.
Knee-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, a seam with a drawstring at the waist and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Jumpsuit in pleated velvet with a round neckline that is slightly deeper at the back and a zip down the back. Short, double-frill sleeves with one layer in tulle with a glittery print. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative drawstring at the front. Straight, ankle-length legs. Unlined.

Blouse in an airy weave with pleated sections, a small stand-up collar, V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Long sleeves with a frill trim around the elbows and narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum. Unlined.
Wide, sleeveless jumper in a soft, fine-knit cashmere and cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps that tie around the ankle and covered heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with lace sections at the front and on the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Two-strand, thin metal chain necklace with one small, round pendant and one rectangular pendant with a marbled plastic bead. Adjustable length 41-48 cm.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Soft cotton towel with a hood. Patterned velour front and terry inside.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves.
High-waisted leggings in sturdy, ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.

Jacket in soft pile with a mesh-lined drawstring hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Side pockets, sections in woven fabric on the underside of the sleeves and down the sides, and ribbed cuffs.
Sleeveless, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps that join at the back.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft jersey with short, flounced sleeves, a slightly wider neckline and horizontal straps at the back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved knitted jumper in a soft viscose blend with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, boxy jacket in soft faux fur with a collar, diagonal hook-and-eye fastening at the top, front pockets and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Lined.
Mesh gym bag with a drawstring at the top. Can be carried like a backpack. Polyester lining. Size 40x45 cm.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, straight dress in a viscose crêpe weave with wide, flared sleeves with a slit and tie. Unlined.
Dress in a silk weave with a concealed zip at the back with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Short trumpet sleeves and a tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Short blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and decorative, covered buttons down the front. Long puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and cuffs, and a wide smocked panel at the back.
Biker jacket with quilted sections, shoulder tabs and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Diagonal zip down the front, and zipped side pockets at the front. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Shorts in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems with raw, roll edges.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top and long sleeves.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder (no press-stud in sizes 1-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

A-line dress in airy, patterned viscose twill with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and a gathered seam at the waist for added width. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in patterned viscose jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover and flounced trims. Seam with a drawstring at the waist.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, a zipped key pocket at the back and a zip at the hems. Reflective details.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey, one with a print motif.
Short shorts in airy, patterned chiffon with an elasticated waist and frilled hems. Lined.
Scarf in an airy linen weave with fringes on the short sides.
